code: var CurrencyFormatter=function CurrencyFormatter(data){var decimals=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var d={amount:data,currency:"USD"};var formattedAmount=new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES',{style:'currency',currency:d.currency,maximumFractionDigits:0}).format(d.amount);debugger;var formatted=formattedAmount.split("US$")[0].trim().replaceAll(".","");var value=decimals==0?+formatted:+formatted/Math.pow(10,decimals);return"$"+value.toLocaleString("de-DE");};export default CurrencyFormatter;
